mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id userId, a.order_id orderId, c.goods_id goodsId, c.goods_name goodsName, b.goods_count goodsCount, b.the_goods_all_price theGoodsAllPrice, c.goods_price goodsPrice, c.goods_original_cost goodsShelfCost FROM t_info_order a LEFT JOIN t_info_order_deepen b ON a.order_id = b.order_id AND a.is_delete = 0 LEFT JOIN t_info_goods c ON b.goods_id = c.goods_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT a.order_id orderId, a.order_all_cost orderAllCost, a.order_state_id orderStateId, a.store_id storeId, b.user_name userName, b.phone phone, a.version version, a.pay_time payTime FROM t_info_order a LEFT JOIN t_sys_user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0
AND b.user_id = #{nowLogin}
AND b.user_name LIKE concat('%', #{o.userName}, '%')
AND b.phone LIKE concat('%', #{o.phone}, '%')
AND a.order_id LIKE concat('%', #{o.orderId}, '%')
AND a.order_state_id LIKE concat('%', #{o.orderStateId}, '%')
AND a.pay_time BETWEEN #{payTimeStart} AND #{payTimeEnd}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT b.order_id orderId, a.order_state_id orderStateId, b.goods_id goodsId, c.goods_inventory goodsInventory, b.goods_count goodsCount, c.version FROM t_info_order_deepen b LEFT JOIN t_info_goods c ON b.goods_id = c.goods_id LEFT JOIN t_info_order a ON a.order_id = b.order_id WHERE b.order_id IN
#{item}
